channel.title: Recording Program?
channel.description:
Well, what would ther best free recording program be for making videos on your computer. I want to make a video tutorial, but i dont know what/where to get a good recording program thats free. Any ideas?
I want it as clear and lag free as possible also (who wouldn't lol)

item.title: Recording Program?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

unregistered hypercam is the only free screen recorder i can find, but i don’t want to even bother withit because it lags wa ytoo much, way too blurry, and I just hate. I will still look around, but i might need to go with hypercam

Read full topic

item.title: Recording Program?
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

http://www.qarbon.com/

this one will alow you to record your screen and talk into a mic,so the veiwer heres your voice and sees a vid,$300 tho…so if u want a free one use hypercam(I got mine free from the site…)

Read full topic

item.title: Recording Program?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Yikes Camtasia is $300 lol. Well, there is unregistered hypercam but those graphics suck ass and I want what i want made at least a little readable…Im actually really surprised that there are no good screen records out there, or at least I can’t find any.

Read full topic

item.title: Recording Program?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Camtasia is a very useful program for making videos but it lags a lot. For some people it doesn’t, but for a lot of others it does. If it lags for you, try using HyperCam. Both are pay programs, so you will either have to buy one of them or use torrents.

I wonder why there isn’t a useful open source video capture program.

Read full topic

item.title: Recording Program?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

I want something that will run smooth and wont show as one big blur like many videos ive seen. There must be a couple out there, right?

Read full topic
